8 #ifndef MPOINT_HPP_
9 #define MPOINT_HPP_

11 #include "mg_types.h"
12 
13 class MDim {
14 public:
15  MDim(){ v.h = 0; v.w = 0; }
16  MDim(mg_size_t w, mg_size_t h){ v.w = w; v.h = h; }
17  MDim(mg_dim_t d){ v = d; }
18 
19  operator mg_dim_t(){ return v; }
20  mg_dim_t dim() const { return v; }
21 
22  inline void set(mg_size_t w, mg_size_t h){ v.w = w; v.h = h; }
23  inline void set_w(mg_size_t w){ v.w = w; }
24  inline void set_h(mg_size_t h){ v.h = h; }
25 
26  inline uint32_t size() const { return v.w * v.h; }
27 
28  inline mg_size_t w() const { return v.w; }
29  inline mg_size_t h() const { return v.h; }
30 
31 private:
32  mg_dim_t v;
33 };

36  *
37  */
38 class MPoint {
39 public:
40  MPoint(){ d.x = 0; d.y = 0; }
41  //MPoint(const MPoint & p ){ d = p; }
42  MPoint(mg_point_t p){ d = p; }
43  MPoint(const mg_t & a);
44  MPoint(mg_int_t x, mg_int_t y){ d.x = x; d.y = y; }
45 
46  mg_point_t point() const { return d; }
47 
48  operator mg_point_t(){ return d; }
49  MPoint & operator=(const mg_point_t & a){ d = a; return *this; }
50  MPoint & operator+(const mg_point_t & a);
51  MPoint & operator-(const mg_point_t & a);
52 
53  inline void set(mg_int_t x, mg_int_t y){ d.x = x; d.y = y; }
54 
55  inline mg_int_t x() const { return d.x; }
56  inline mg_int_t y() const { return d.y; }
57 
58  void map(const mg_map_t & m);
59 
60  void rotate(mg_int_t angle);
61  void scale(mg_size_t x, mg_size_t y);
62  void scale(mg_size_t a);
63  const MPoint shift(mg_int_t x, mg_int_t y);
64  const MPoint shift(const mg_point_t & p);
65 
66 private:
67  mg_point_t d;
68 };
69 
70 class MObject {
71 public:
72  MObject(){}
73  MObject(mg_int_t x, mg_int_t y, mg_size_t w, mg_size_t h){
74  object_.point.x = x;
75  object_.point.y = y;
76  object_.dim.w = w;
77  object_.dim.h = h;
78  }
79 
80  MObject(const MPoint & point, const MDim & dim){
81  object_.point = point.point();
82  object_.dim = dim.dim();
83  }
84 
85  mg_object_t object() const { return object_; }
86 
87  operator mg_object_t(){ return object_; }
88 
89  inline mg_int_t x() const { return object_.point.x; }
90  inline mg_int_t y() const { return object_.point.y; }
91  inline mg_int_t w() const { return object_.dim.w; }
92  inline mg_int_t h() const { return object_.dim.h; }
93 
94 
95 private:
96  mg_object_t object_;
97 };
